prompt: List all pending incidents in Veracity Delhi with their locations.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlLocation_MEM, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 3 AND b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Show Video Loss incidents in Delhi with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss' AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Find incidents with priority 3 and their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG = 3;

prompt: Count the number of extra incidents by status.
completion: SELECT is.insName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra' GROUP BY is.insName_TXT;

prompt: List all open incidents with their unit names and alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1;

prompt: Show incidents in Rohini with their category names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, ic.incName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini';

prompt: Find all non-reactive incidents with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1;

prompt: List incidents on test in Delhi with their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmOnTest_BLN = 1 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Show closed incidents with their action taken and category names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlActionTaken_MEM, ic.incName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 2;

prompt: Find incidents with latitude less than 28.6 and their street names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE il.inlLatitude_DEC < 28.6;

prompt: List all extra incidents with their status and building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra';

prompt: Show incidents with color priority set before December 20, 2024.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlColourPrioritySetTime_DTM FROM IncidentLog_TBL il WHERE il.inlColourPrioritySetTime_DTM < '2024-12-20 00:00:00';

prompt: Find all Video Loss incidents with their location and unit names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlLocation_MEM, u.untUnitName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK LEFT JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'Video Loss';

prompt: Count incidents by category.
completion: SELECT ic.incName_TXT, COUNT(il.IncidentLog_PRK) AS incident_count FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK GROUP BY ic.incName_TXT;

prompt: List incidents in Veracity Delhi with their alarm type and status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlProAlarmType_FRK, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE b.bldBuildingName_TXT = 'Veracity Delhi';

prompt: Show open incidents in Delhi with their incident details.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlIncidentDetails_MEM, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE il.inlStatus_FRK = 1 AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';

prompt: Find all incidents ordered by priority with their building names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG, b.bldBuildingName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Building_TBL b ON il.inlBuilding_FRK = b.Building_PRK ORDER BY il.inlAlarmPriority_LNG;

prompt: List all non-reactive incidents in Rohini with their category names.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, ic.incName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN Unit_TBL u ON il.inlUnit_FRK = u.Unit_PRK JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK WHERE il.inlAlarmNonReactive_BLN = 1 AND u.untUnitName_TXT = 'Rohini';

prompt: Show incidents closed before December 25, 2024, with their status.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, is.insName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentStatus_TBL is ON il.inlStatus_FRK = is.IncidentStatus_PRK WHERE il.inlClosedDateTime_DTM < '2024-12-25 00:00:00';

prompt: Find all extra incidents in Delhi with their alarm messages.
completion: SELECT il.IncidentLog_PRK, il.inlTitle_TXT, il.inlAlarmMessage_TXT, s.strName_TXT FROM IncidentLog_TBL il JOIN IncidentCategory_TBL ic ON il.inlCategory_FRK = ic.IncidentCategory_PRK JOIN Street_TBL s ON il.inlStreet_FRK = s.Street_PRK WHERE ic.incName_TXT = 'extra' AND s.strName_TXT = 'Delhi';
